Given its size and the potential weight of its cargo, the ego car must maintain a safe following distance to allow for adequate stopping time and react to any unexpected maneuvers the commercial vehicle might make.

Usage of headlights and possibly fog lamps, if available and necessary due to the conditions, would increase visibility for the ego car and make it more visible to other road users. Maintain a safe distance from the truck, avoid being in its blind spot, and do not attempt to overtake until a clear and safe opportunity arises. Monitor the truck's indicators for any signs of intention to change lanes or turn. Be prepared to adjust speed accordingly to maintain safety.
